languages.text: "Я слышал, что многие превозносят {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}подвиги твоего разума{/d}, называя твою мудрость даром самого Императора. Глупцы! Разве не ведают они, что зерна ереси лучше всего всходят в умах просвещенных? Понимание лишь ослабляет волю к деяниям!"

"I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"
languages.original_text: "Я слышал, что многие превозносят {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}подвиги твоего разума{/d}, называя твою мудрость даром самого Императора. Глупцы! Разве не ведают они, что зерна ереси лучше всего всходят в умах просвещенных? Понимание лишь ослабляет волю к деяниям!"

traits.locale_text: "I have heard many exalt the deeds of your intellect and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

"I have heard many exalt the deeds of your intellect and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

"I have heard many exalt the deeds of your intellect and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

"I have heard many exalt the deeds of your intellect and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

"I have heard many exalt the deeds of your intellect and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

languages.text: “我听到很多人称赞你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}聪明才智{/d}，称你的智慧是帝皇亲自赐予你的礼物。那些蠢货！难道他们不明白，异端的种子在开明的头脑中生长得最快吗？思想只会侵蚀行动的意志！”
languages.original_text: "I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

traits.locale_text: “我听到很多人称赞你的聪明才智，称你的智慧是帝皇亲自赐予你的礼物。那些蠢货！难道他们不明白，异端的种子在开明的头脑中生长得最快吗？思想只会侵蚀行动的意志！”

languages.text: "Ich habe schon viele {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Euren Intellekt{/d} preisen hören, Eure Weisheit als Geschenk des Imperators selbst darstellen. Narren! Wissen sie denn nicht, dass die Saat der Ketzerei in einem erleuchteten Verstand am schnellsten sprießt? Verständnis untergräbt nur den Willen zu handeln!"
languages.original_text: "I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe schon viele Euren Intellekt preisen hören, Eure Weisheit als Geschenk des Imperators selbst darstellen. Narren! Wissen sie denn nicht, dass die Saat der Ketzerei in einem erleuchteten Verstand am schnellsten sprießt? Verständnis untergräbt nur den Willen zu handeln!"

languages.text: « Nombreux sont ceux qui encensent {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}votre intellect{/d} et disent que votre sagesse est un don de l'Empereur. Ce ne sont que des imbéciles ! Ignorent-ils donc que les esprits éclairés sont un terreau des plus fertiles pour les graines de l'hérésie ? La compréhension ne fait qu'éroder la volonté d'agir ! »
languages.original_text: "I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

traits.locale_text: « Nombreux sont ceux qui encensent votre intellect et disent que votre sagesse est un don de l'Empereur. Ce ne sont que des imbéciles ! Ignorent-ils donc que les esprits éclairés sont un terreau des plus fertiles pour les graines de l'hérésie ? La compréhension ne fait qu'éroder la volonté d'agir ! »

languages.text: «He oído que muchos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}exaltan su intelecto{/d} y proclaman que su sabiduría es un don del mismísimo Emperador. ¡Insensatos! ¿Acaso no saben que una mente ilustrada es el terreno de cría perfecto para las semillas de la herejía? ¡La comprensión solo socava la voluntad de actuar!».
languages.original_text: "I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

traits.locale_text: «He oído que muchos exaltan su intelecto y proclaman que su sabiduría es un don del mismísimo Emperador. ¡Insensatos! ¿Acaso no saben que una mente ilustrada es el terreno de cría perfecto para las semillas de la herejía? ¡La comprensión solo socava la voluntad de actuar!».

languages.text: 「多くの者たちが{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}あなたの知性{/d}を称えるのを、その英知が皇帝からの賜物であると称える声をよく耳にする。愚か者どもめが！異端の種は悟りを開いた心に最も早く芽吹くことを知らないのだろうか。理解は行動の意志を蝕むだけだ！」
languages.original_text: "I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

traits.locale_text: 「多くの者たちが{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}あなたの知性{/d}を称えるのを、その英知が皇帝からの賜物であると称える声をよく耳にする。愚か者どもめが！異端の種は悟りを開いた心に最も早く芽吹くことを知らないのだろうか。理解は行動の意志を蝕むだけだ！」

languages.text: "Birçoklarının {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}zekânı{/d} methettiğini, irfanının da bizzat İmparator Hazretleri'nden armağan olduğunu işittim. Sersemler! Kâfirlik tohumlarının en tez aydınlık zihinlerde yeşerdiğini bilmezler mi? Anlamak, eyleme geçme arzusuna ket vurur!"
languages.original_text: "I have heard many exalt the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}deeds of your intellect{/d} and call your wisdom a gift from the Emperor Himself. Fools! Do they not know that the seeds of heresy sprout quickest in an enlightened mind? Understanding only erodes the will to act!"

traits.locale_text: "Birçoklarının zekânı methettiğini ve irfanınının İmparator'un kendisinden gelen bir armağan olduğunu işittim. Sersemler! Kâfirliğin en hızlı yayıldığı yerin aydınlık bir zihin olduğunu bilmezler mi? Anlamak, eyleme geçme iradesine ket vurur!"
